price: بۆ ئەوەی ھیچ شتێک نەپەرستن بێجگە لەخوا بەڕاستی من لەلایەن ئەو (خوا) وە بۆ ئێوە ترسێنەر و موژدەدەرم
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
